caption.p:
Ceiling art panel at Leang Timpuseng showing pXRF spectra indicative of geological salts (assay location shown with dots; relative element abundance in counts per second), the location and age of Uranium series dates
7 and (inset) scanning electron micrographs (secondary electron images taken at 10Â kV) showing the extent of haloclasty/salt crystallisation on the underside (left) and profile (right) of the same spall flake.
